# ImmersiveCamera.CameraType

**Enumeration**

A value that represents the type of immersive camera.

## Declaration

```swift
enum CameraType
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **ImmersiveCamera.CameraType.stereoCamera**: A value that represents a camera rig made up of two cameras.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
